subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: The racecar driver, who died Monday at 74, won the Daytona 500 on his 18th attempt after taking on less gas than usual to save a few seconds during his final pit stop.
snippet: The racecar driver, who died Monday at 74, won the Daytona 500 on his 18th attempt after taking on less gas than usual to save a few seconds during his final pit stop.
